Text:
Seen this on BBC2,fascinating how one German Teleprompter operator re-sent a high command message and made mistakes and from that they were able to break the successor to the Enigma machine.
 Truly amazing men,that saved many many lives,true heroes.
OK, I got the download from the early multiple RAR file torrent, turned it into one file and used it for this torrent. Seems to work, so I'm now (slowly) seeding here.
